test_payload_example.description: Example webhook payload to test Manual Hunter workflow

payload.full_ocr_text: ABB DRIVES ACS580-01-12A5-4 Variable Frequency Drive 480V 3-Phase Input 12.5HP Output

curl_command: curl -X POST http://72.60.175.144:5678/webhook/rivet-manual-hunter -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"chat_id": 123456789, "original_message_id": 987654321, "manufacturer": "ABB", "model_number": "ACS580-01-12A5-4", "product_family": "ACS580", "full_ocr_text": "ABB DRIVES ACS580-01-12A5-4 Variable Frequency Drive 480V 3-Phase Input 12.5HP Output"}'

test_scenarios.name: Rare Equipment (should reach Tier 3)
test_scenarios.expected: Perplexity deep search or queue for human

test_scenarios.name: Cache Hit Test
test_scenarios.expected: Instant return from cache (run after first test)
